caption.p: ( A) Schematic of the preparation of the MOF–alginate composite. Photographs of ( B) alginate hydrogels cross-linked by Cu 2+ right after the addition of a sodium alginate aqueous solution to a Cu 2+ aqueous solution, ( C) alginate hydrogels cross-linked by Cu 2+ after being washed with water and ethanol, and ( D) HKUST-1–alginate hydrogels [ 159]. Reprinted with permission from Ref. [ 159]. Copyright American Chemical Society, 2016.
